title: Banijay Group 2025 Company Profile: Stock Performance & Earnings | PitchBook
snippet: Banijay Group is headquartered in Paris, France. Banijay Group has 8,166 total employees. Banijay Group’s primary industry is Movies, Music and Entertainment. Banijay Group is a Public company.
